# Apigee - Delete integrations
**Announcement:** Application Integration is now available for your Google Cloud project. You can now use both Apigee Integration and Application Integration within the same Google Cloud project. [Learn more](/apigee/docs/api-platform/integration/using-application-integration)
**Warning:** When you delete an integration, you permanently delete all the versions of that integration, including all the integration variables, configured triggers, tasks, and data mappings. Deleting an integration cannot be undone.
To delete an integration, perform the following steps:
- In the [Apigee UI](https://apigee.google.com) , select your.
- Click **Develop > Integrations** .
- Do any one of the following steps in the **Integrations List** page:- For the existing integration that you want to delete, clickmore_vert **Actions** .
- Select **Delete** in the drop-down menu.A confirmation dialog appears.
Or- Click the existing integration that you want to delete.This opens the integration in the .
- In the designer toolbar, clickmore_vert(Actions menu) and select **Clone integration > Delete all versions** .A confirmation dialog appears.
- Click **Delete** to permanently delete the integration
